title: The AI Hype Index: The people can’t get enough of AI slop
summary: Separating AI reality from hyped-up fiction isn’t always easy. title: The State of AI: Chatbot companions and the future of our privacy
summary: Welcome back to The State of AI, a new collaboration between the Financial Times and MIT Technology Review. Every Monday, writers from both publications debate one aspect of the generative AI revolution reshaping global power. In this week’s conversation MIT Technology Review’s senior reporter for features and investigations, Eileen Guo, and FT tech correspondent Melissa…

title: What’s next for AlphaFold: A conversation with a Google DeepMind Nobel laureate
summary: In 2017, fresh off a PhD on theoretical chemistry, John Jumper heard rumors that Google DeepMind had moved on from building AI that played games with superhuman skill and was starting up a secret project to predict the structures of proteins. He applied for a job. Just three years later, Jumper celebrated a stunning win…
